title: さくらんぼとももとキウイの温フルーツもち
comment: 温かい煮フルーツとやわらかいもちの組み合わせが斬新で、とても季節感のある一品です。キウイは加熱で色や食感が変わりやすいので短時間だけ煮るか、仕上げに生のスライスを添えると美味しさが際立ちます。さくらんぼと桃の甘酸っぱさがもちに合わさって、思わずにっこりしてしまう危険なほど魅力的なデザートです。
image_prompt: A warm, appetizing dessert on a simple rustic ceramic plate: a soft, slightly glossy mochi at the center topped with glossy poached cherries, tender simmered peach slices and vibrant green kiwi pieces in a light amber syrup. Steam gently rising from the mochi and syrup, syrup catching the light with sparkling highlights, the cherries deep red and shiny, peaches soft peach-pink with visible fibers, kiwi showing bright green flesh and tiny black seeds (some pieces lightly softened from cooking). Garnish with a small fresh mint leaf and a light dusting of powdered sugar, syrup drizzling down the mochi edge. Natural window light, shallow depth of field, warm tones, photorealistic, high detail, close-up appetizing composition on a wooden table background, 50mm lens feel, studio-food photography style.
